mapper.select: select drug_id, drug_name, drug_type, drug_price, goods_count, produce_time, overdue_time, is_overdue, produce_vendor, comment from medicine_catalog where drug_id = #{drugId}
mapper.insert: insert into medicine_catalog(drug_name, drug_type, drug_price, goods_count, produce_time, overdue_time, is_overdue, produce_vendor, comment) values (#{drugName}, #{drugType}, #{drugPrice}, #{goodsCount}, #{produceTime}, #{overdueTime}, #{isOverdue}, #{produceVendor}, #{comment})

insert into medicine_catalog(drug_name, drug_type, drug_price, goods_count, produce_time, overdue_time, is_overdue, produce_vendor, comment) values
(#{entity.drugName}, #{entity.drugType}, #{entity.drugPrice}, #{entity.goodsCount}, #{entity.produceTime}, #{entity.overdueTime}, #{entity.isOverdue}, #{entity.produceVendor}, #{entity.comment})

insert into medicine_catalog(drug_name, drug_type, drug_price, goods_count, produce_time, overdue_time, is_overdue, produce_vendor, comment) values
(#{entity.drugName}, #{entity.drugType}, #{entity.drugPrice}, #{entity.goodsCount}, #{entity.produceTime}, #{entity.overdueTime}, #{entity.isOverdue}, #{entity.produceVendor}, #{entity.comment})
on duplicate key update drug_name = values(drug_name), drug_type = values(drug_type), drug_price = values(drug_price), goods_count = values(goods_count), produce_time = values(produce_time), overdue_time = values(overdue_time), is_overdue = values(is_overdue), produce_vendor = values(produce_vendor), comment = values(comment)
mapper.update:
update medicine_catalog
drug_name = #{drugName},
drug_type = #{drugType},
drug_price = #{drugPrice},
goods_count = #{goodsCount},
produce_time = #{produceTime},
overdue_time = #{overdueTime},
is_overdue = #{isOverdue},
produce_vendor = #{produceVendor},
comment = #{comment},
where drug_id = #{drugId}
